ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m totally ready to
go off and explore...
ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_03_10:
but there’s no one around
to look me in the eye.
ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_01_10:
If you’re eager to battle but you can’t
seem to find an opponent...
ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_02_10:
that’s when you should dash over to the
Pokémon Center and talk to Trista!
ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_03_10:
She’ll help you reach out to your friends
so you can go out exploring together!
ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_01_10:
If you can’t seem to meet eyes with any
other Trainers, you should go and talk to
Trista at the reception desk!
ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_02_10: She’ll always be there to look you in the eye!
ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_01_10:
Chopping wood is a cinch
with its two giant pincers.
ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_03_10:
Perfectly straight posture!
What I’d give for that...
ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_01_10:
My partner here is the Stag Beetle
Pokémon, Pinsir!
ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_02_10:
Pinsir’s the perfect Pokémon for a camper
like me! He can chop a piece of firewood
in half lickety-split!
ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_03_10:
His superflat back is the best part
about him, though! It sure makes riding
Pinsir easier than, say, Heracross!
ch0086_00_campm/2702_0702_01_10:
Then again, Heracross’s horn is a lot
easier to grab on to.
ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_01_10:
There are as many moves
out there as there are
Pokémon types!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_02_10:
There are ones that make
your Pokémon rock solid!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_03_10:
And the more you use
them, the stronger your
Pokémon’s defenses get!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_01_10:
There are all kinds of different moves
that your Pokémon can use!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_02_10:
For example, there are moves 
that can increase your Pokémon’s defenses 
or reduce your opponent’s! Isn’t that cool?!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_03_10:
If you use a move like that two or three times
or more, it’ll be that much more effective!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_04_10:
Keep using it, and your Pokémon’ll be
rock solid for sure!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_01_10:
Wait... What if my Pokémon could learn a move
that makes my opponent infatuated with me?!
ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_02_10:
That...that would make me super popular!
I wonder if moves can actually work
on people, not just Pokémon...
ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_01_10:
Maybe I should listen to
the radio today, too...
ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_02_10:
Gathering data is one of
the basics of being a
good Trainer, after all.
ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_03_10:
I just learned that male
and female Pokémon can
look really different.
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_01_10:
Battling is a surefire way to make your
Pokémon stronger, but gathering data is
really important, too.
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_02_10:
I’ve started listening to the radio to get my
information. I bet I know way more about
Pokémon now!
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_03_10:
Take Magikarp, for example! Did you know
that males have yellow whiskers and
females have white?
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_04_10:
Whether or not that knowledge helps you
make your Pokémon stronger all depends
on you!
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_01_10:
Knowledge is a greater weapon than
raw strength.
ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_02_10:
Knowing that Magikarp get super strong when
they evolve into Gyarados makes it easier
to persevere through training one.
ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_01_10:
I only choose the most
beautiful Pokémon.
They suit me the best!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_02_10:
But what can I do to get
closer to my Pokémon?
What’ll make him like me?
ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_03_10:
Maybe I need to be more
beautiful! And confident!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_01_10:
You look pretty confident
to me already, kid!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_02_10:
Shucks, I’m wonderin’ the
same thing! How do I get
MY Pokémon to like me?
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_01_10:
Aha! Maybe it’s all about showing affection!
I should try petting and grooming my Weepinbell
more often. That oughta do the trick!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_02_10:
Ohoho! You may be right, m’boy!
My Onix is massive, though. Pettin’ and
groomin’ all that stone is no easy feat...
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_03_10:
Hmm... Well then, how else are you gonna
get your Pokémon to like you?
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_04_10:
Well, do you think just bein’ a swell person
in general could be enough to get a Pokémon
to warm up to you? Seems plausible.
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_05_10:
Yeah! I think you’re onto something!
If we want our Pokémon to like us more,
we’ve gotta work on ourselves first, huh!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_06_10:
Hmm... Think getting squeaky clean in the bath
will help? I should fix my hair, too... Maybe I
could get some fashion advice from a Sylveon!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_07_10:
Hey, you shouldn’t mention other Pokémon
around your Weepinbell. He’ll get jealous,
and that kinda defeats the purpose!
ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_08_10:
Really? Did I make you jealous, Weepinbell?
I’m sorry, buddy. From now on, it’ll just be
you and me!
ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_01_10:
I gotta look cool so I can show off
to my girlfriend!
ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_02_10: Do me a favor and battle with me!
ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_01_10:
I can be pretty stylish when I’m putting up
a tent, but that’s basically the only
cool thing about me...
ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_02_10:
I should just give up... Yep.
I’m gonna spend the rest of my life boasting
about how well I can put up a tent...
ch0086_00_campm/1903_0101_01_10:
When it comes to camping, safety comes first!
Same goes for Pokémon battling!
ch0086_00_campm/1903_0501_01_10: I thought it was safe to say I’d beat you...
ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_01_10:
You know, you should always be prepared
for the unexpected!
ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_02_10:
Then again, if you’re always prepared for the
unexpected, is it really unexpected anymore?
